originalText.text: The only reason I gave it a 4 star is because you have to share kitchen & bathroom & living room/dining room w roommate.. But if your roommate is clean like mine you‚Äôre great ‚ù§Ô∏è I LOVE THIS PLACE. Compared to where I was placed before this is a palace. Apartment is huge! You get a big refrigerator in your room so you don‚Äôt worry about anyone taking your drinks/food. You have laundry on each floor no need to go outside. Front desk were extremely friendly & helpful. I haven‚Äôt met my case manager but I heard great things so far üôèüèΩ‚ù§Ô∏è If you‚Äôre looking for a shelter, this is the best place to be. Trust me!

originalText.text: Horrible. I originally wasnt even going to be intaked because my daughter was in the NICU! Even though i was specifically sent here by certain people. This place has roaches the shower in my room barely works the toilet barely works,. The head security is cold mean arrogant and thinks shes above everyone and looks down on people and shes extremely nosey. Having my preemie newborn in a place like this really amped up my PPD, You cant have visitors you cant leave after 9pm, you feel trapped. Its literally an institution.

originalText.text: This place helped me out sooooooo much my case worker was wonderful and they give. You help with job search and help with information about government program's helping. Families. With apts , the security and caseworkers were polite ans friendly and the childcare. Providers are the best haven't found anyone. Better with my son yet
